casebody.data:
EWART
v.
SLAGEL 155P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 23, 2018 Mr. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. David Wayne Ewart, for Ewart, David Wayne Mr. Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of May 2018 by Petitioner for Notice of Appeal:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of May 2018."
